articles.title: 'A terrible year to move hemispheres': The Kiwi family locked down for months on a remote Irish island - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: They've endured among the longest lockdowns in Europe, but come to appreciate 'the simple life' on their bleakly beautiful wee isle.
articles.content: If youre struggling with lockdown, spare a thought for the Dillane family. In the year-and-a-half since they moved to Ireland in search of a better life, theyve spent most of their time confined to a… [+7175 chars]

articles.title: Europe's health agency says no urgent need to roll out COVID-19 booster shots to fully vaccinated - CBC.ca
articles.description: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control says that, based on available data on vaccine effectiveness, there was no urgent need for the administration of booster doses of COVID-19 vaccines to fully vaccinated individuals.
articles.content: The global debate over COVID-19 vaccine boosters is continuing, with Europe's health agency now saying there is no need to rush another round of shots even as multiple countries are doling out additi… [+2819 chars]

articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.title: New coronavirus strain designated a variant of interest by WHO - The Irish Times
articles.description: Mu first identified in Colombia in January with cases also recorded in Europe
articles.content:
A new coronavirus strain, named Mu, has been designated a variant of interest by the World Health Organisation (WHO).

articles.title: New COVID-19 variant Mu shows signs of vaccine resistance; all you need to know - Firstpost
